body: What I'd like to add is that probably why the mother accepted the siblings having sex is because she knew they weren't blood related. When the mother was pregnant with the daughter, she became friends with the granddaughter of her teacher who is the actual mother of the brother. And also yes the old man is the father of the sister. And also, I'm sure this was foreshadowing but when the sister first has sex with the pervert, he requests her to call him by a different name, and since she doesn't know his name, she just decided to go with "Papa".

Summary copied from a comment on E-hentai: All the characters in this story are somehow insane.

Brother: starts loving his sister for a very poor excuse
Sister: accepts every penis she sees no matter what
Mother: accepts sibling's sex for no adequately explored reason
Sister's ex-boyfriend: a mere rapist
The pervert introduced by sister's ex-boyfriend: forgives a designer that missed the deadline for the fifth time. And yes, he's definitely a pervert.

[Spoiler]

Brother: There is no blood relation with his sister or his mother. His real mother has passed away. He accepts every sex-relationship of his sister.
Sister: bores a child between her father (without noticing it, however.)
Mother: had fucked the pervert when she was his teacher and born the sister.
Sister's ex-boyfriend: becomes a good video game writer, and this post-fin information is totally useless.
The pervert: He's actually the real father of the sister. (At least he didn't know, but there was a good chance he could have
Yeah it’s an NTR but we desperately need a summary for this. Kinda confused who is who, what is really happening etc.
should've looked into comments section first, now i feel like shit.
hentusuiast is onto something which we can't disagree with.
@hentusiast should've looked at the comment section. fuck

Some bullshit ntr again, of the worst kind, with pretensions of realism, with some effort put into the story and characters. With female going on binge whoring like some forty something ex sailor goes on binge drinking, and always returning, always returning to her little emotional tampon when the life kicks her in the guts for the n-th time, and always with a smile and a warm gesture. Hypocrisy. That's what gets to me, makes my stomach turn. Fuck this shit, this should never be translated. Ugly bastard ntr? Be my guest. This shit? Burn it.
